charges.charge_description: 18:1542.F FALSE STATEMENT IN APPLICATION/USE OF PASSPORT (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to 5 years Probation; $100.00 Special Assessment. No Fine. Complaint dismissed by the Court. (JTE) (1)

charges.charge_description: On or about February 28, 1998 in Niagara County, in the Western District of New York Defendant did willfully and knowingly use and attempt to use a passport the issue of which was secured by a false statement in violation of 18 U.S.C. 1542. [1:98-m-3001]
